mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reply (comment_id, post_id, author_email, content, created_date, parent_comment_id) VALUES (seq_reply.nextval, #{post_id}, #{author_email}, #{content}, SYSDATE, #{parent_comment_id, jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: SELECT r.comment_id, r.post_id, r.author_email, r.content, r.created_date, r.parent_comment_id, CASE WHEN c.leader_email = r.author_email THEN '동아리장' WHEN m.user_email IS NOT NULL THEN '회원' ELSE '비회원' END AS writer_role FROM reply r JOIN post p ON r.post_id = p.post_id JOIN club c ON p.club_id = c.club_id LEFT JOIN member m ON (p.club_id = m.club_id AND r.author_email = m.user_email) WHERE r.post_id = #{post_id} ORDER BY COALESCE(r.parent_comment_id, r.comment_id), r.comment_id ASC
